title: Override Animal Sounds
description:
Complete the code:
1. Animal class has makeSound() that returns "Some sound"
2. Dog class overrides makeSound() to return "Bark"
3. Cat class overrides makeSound() to return "Meow"
instructions:
Complete the code:
1. Animal class has makeSound() that returns "Some sound"
2. Dog class overrides makeSound() to return "Bark"
3. Cat class overrides makeSound() to return "Meow"

testCases.description:
Animal a = new Animal();
return a.makeSound();

Dog d = new Dog();
return d.makeSound();

Cat c = new Cat();
return c.makeSound();

Animal a = new Dog();
return a.makeSound();

hints.text: Read the instructions carefully and break down the problem into smaller steps.
If stuck, try writing out the solution in plain English first, then convert to java code.
